Still going strong after +5 years, there's no secret why. Once you start getting the hang of it, you're slowly but surely addicted to it. Features such as Random Item collection, endless amounts of crafting (Don't get too addicted to it), a variety of classes and their tactical (And not so tactical) abilities, basic but not boring game modes, casual and competitive play, and last but not least, a Golden Fry Pan.
DON'T PLAY THIS GAME, BAD GAMEPLAY SYSTEM

This game, although probably annoying to beginners at first(dying a lot, etc), becomes an intuitive and fun game the more they play. Since the game is a bit user-unfriendly, beginners may struggle in pubs(get annoyed, etc). But those who continue to play and begin to understand the basic game mechanics will eventually get sucked into the game. A perfect example would be myself. I began playing for almost two years, which is nothing compared to others, but I whole heartedly enjoy this game to its roots. I'm into competitive, but I am probably not skilled enough to play on a team(or have the time to play on a team). I'm decent at most of the classes, but I could definitely improve. I don't know what would turn me away from this game. The game has its moments for sure, whether its a friendly gathering where everyone is having fun and relaxing, or intensive, fighting a clutch 1v1 for a round win. It could be a cool kill you got, hitting an enemy in midair or headshotting scouts close range(it feels so good). And the game has its frustrating moments as well. Sometimes I may be having a bad day, missing easy kills and dying stupid deaths. Somedays I'm tempted to stop playing and quit, but I always play on. The community is great, both casual and competitive. I highly recommend this game. If you plan on picking this game up, try not to get frustrated in your first few hours. Patience is a virtue. It certainly applies here

Was a very awesome game to play with friends for the first 2-3 years it was out. During that time it was the best multiplayer FPS you could be playing.

Then they added a bunch of random items, which was cool at first. They had different stats and pros and cons to weigh out when using different ones.

Then they added Hats and everyone just sat around in servers afk or just sat around circle-jerking each other for hats, trading hats, showing off hats, the game turned into a damn barbie dress up game that 11yr old girls would orgasm over.

Gra bardzo fajna uwielbiam grać moim ostrym Tomaszem ( mój nóż do tfa) często gram na serwerach społeczności.  

Minusy gry
- w tej grze można spotkać w 90% same dzieci 
-Dzieci z pierdzacym mikro
-Zwalone administrację na serwerach 
Plusy gry
+Dużo postaci
+Ciekawe tryby których nielubie
+Można sobie umilić życie bardziej niż grając z ruskimi MMA

Ogólna ocena gry 7/10
